product_name: BeautyStat CosmeticsUniversal Microbiome Barrier Balancing Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBeautyStat's Universal Microbiome Barrier Balancing Cleanser is a gentle foaming cleanser that removes makeup while supporting skin's microbiome and natural protective barrier. Purifies without stripping, leaving skin clean, protected and radiant.
details: DetailsBenefitsA one-step cleanser that removes makeup, sunscreen, grime, dirt, impurities and environmental hazardsPromotes a healthy skin microbiome to prevent irritations, minimize oxidative skin damage and keeps skin hydratedProvides antimicrobial and antibacterial protection to help reduce signs of agingFormulated for all skin tones, textures and types, including sensitive skin and blemish proneClinically and Dermatologist-TestedPackaging may varyKey IngredientsMicrosilverVegan CeramidesVitaminsAmino AcidsProteinsResearch Results100% of subjects showed improvement in skin moisture94% of subjects showed improvement in skin barrier function74% of subjects showed improvement in skin brightnessClinically proven to improve skin moisture by 113% immediately after use and 118% after 1 weekItem 2636494How To UseLather a nickel-size amount on wet palms, working up a creamy, soft foam.Massage onto wet face, removing makeup and grime. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry.Use AM to brighten, refresh and arm your defenses to protect skin against environmental hazards. Use PM to remove makeup and dirt.Follow with C Refiner Vitamin C Serum and Pro-Bio Moisture Boost Cream for best results.Packaging may varyIngredientsWater, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Propanediol, Potassium Hydroxide, Myristic Acid, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Bismuth Oxychloride, Carbomer, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Sucrose, Silver, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Sterols, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Linoleic Acid, Squalane, Caffeine, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Oil, Hordeum Distichon (Barley) Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Mica, Coconut Alkanes, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Sodium Chloride, Dicaprylyl Ether, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Polyquaternium-39, Lecithin, Sodium Benzoate, Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Glyceryl Undecylenate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather a nickel-size amount on wet palms, working up a creamy, soft foam.Massage onto wet face, removing makeup and grime. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry.Use AM to brighten, refresh and arm your defenses to protect skin against environmental hazards. Use PM to remove makeup and dirt.Follow with C Refiner Vitamin C Serum and Pro-Bio Moisture Boost Cream for best results.Packaging may vary

reviews.headline: Saved my skin!
reviews.comments:
My previous cleanser stopped working for me and I was finding I was getting frequent breakouts. I didn't want to keep putting acids on my face so in desperation tried this. And not only did it work, it's basically saved my skin!
My mum has been in and out of hospital the last few weeks and I've been consistently masked up for that, even sleeping overnight in heavy duty N95 masks and have experienced zero breakouts, even in the places where the seams are pressing against my face! This has definitely helped my barrier be more resilient and is my go-to cleanser now.

reviews.headline: TOO gentle
reviews.comments: It lathers nicely and my skin doesn't feel dry afterwards. My main problem is that this product does not remove makeup well even if double cleansing.

reviews.headline: Beauty stat Cosmetics universal microbiome barrier balancing
reviews.comments: It's a good product. Cleansing pores and skin very well. Skin becomes soft and clean . I would buy it again.

reviews.headline: My top two favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: I loveee the way beauty stats cleanser makes me feel i have dry, sensitive, acne prone skin and this cleanser and the clinique acne foam wash are the best non stripping cleansers ive ever used. I actually wanted to try beauty stat after i heard that the founder ron used to be a chemist for clinque and im so glad i did all his products are great.

reviews.headline: Amazing Cleanser
reviews.comments:
I've been testing the BeautyStat Universal Microbiome Barrier Balancing Cleanser, and OMG...where has this been all my life?

This isn't your average cleanser-it's formulated to PROTECT YOUR SKIN'S MICROBIOME AND YOUR BARRIER while giving you that fresh, clean feel (without the tightness or dryness) It feels like a creamy cloud, packed with soothing Centella and Chamomile and leaves my skin hydrated, calm and balanced. Would I recommend? 1000% YES!

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Love that it doesnt dry my skin out . I was skeptical because i was reordering it and it looks like the branding has changed from the last bottle i bought and also they went down on the oz but still same high dollar price which doesnt mske sense.

reviews.headline: Good for many but not all
reviews.comments:
I'm nearing 40, have medium to light skin that is NOT sensitive unless I'm in an autoimmune flare (i have APS), combination skin, and tend to develop mild acne in the dry areas of my cheeks and on my temples (because I also wear glasses). I also have KP, that mostly develops in my "stache" area, but can develop on the sides of my face and neck without regular care. 
For my oily areas (primarily my nose) and eye/brow area, this worked wonderfully, but for everywhere else it worsened the dryness, and also increased acne. I had to use two different cleansers for it to be of any use, which somewhat defeats the purpose for me. My summertime and autumn experiences with it were more positive, but the acne problem still stuck around too. 
To be clear, I don't feel it contributed to worsening acne, just that it doesnt work well enough to get rid of it or prevent it. 
Even during autoimmune flares ive had, and while using using trentinoin, it did not cause irritation. It was actually a bit soothing!! For this reason I give it three stars.

reviews.headline: great product!
reviews.comments: received a sample of this product, and it was amazing! didn't dry my skin out or anything.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recieved this product free from BeautyStat for my honest review.
I have to say this is definitely the most interesting cleanser I have ever used. 
The fact that this cleanser is actually going to help protect my skin from aggressive germs,  toxins and viruses is incredible!
Not only is this going to protect my skin but balance and strengthen the skins natural microbiome. 
This has a thick and rich texture to it which means a small amount goes a long ways. It took me several uses to figure out I could take less again than the previous uses.
I love how this feels on my skin.  This is so rich, creamy and luxurious feeling on my skin; purely soothing. The richness of this cleanser is evident while I am massaging into my skin as it feels just velvety.  This rinses off completely and makes my skin feel renewed is the closest I can come to describe it. It doesn't feel just clean and moisturized; it feels balanced!!  It's truly unlike and incomparable to any cleanser I've ever used.
I have oily, somewhat problematic skin and this has been a dream for my skin. My skin has been almost totally free of any blemishes since I started using this. I used to wake up with shiny, oily skin every morning but no more!! This definitely has balanced out my skin in the most amazing way! I've found I need less moisturizer since using this too. THIS has become my FAVORITE CLEANSER!!
I highly recommend this as more than just a cleanser, BUT, a protective, balancing cleanser! And, just and fyi, I rarely give a product 5 stars. These are well earned!!
faceoff_positive.headline: A Real Cleansing Game Changer!

faceoff_negative.comments: The reason I gave the product 3 stars was this product just seems simple to me. There wasn't a WOW feeling. It just felt ok, simple, bland. It would not get me excited to wash my face. There are some face cleansers that gives one feels of excitement, more wake, just happier feeling, Feel the cleanness. Not this cleanser. This product would not be for the ones who want that feeling during and after.  I used the product and can't really tell if it really did anything better than my other face cleanser. This product suppose to have MicroSliverBG, that is suppose to get rid of germs, viruses, and other toxins on the skin. Unsure if my skin is cleaner or if it had germs, viruses and other toxins. So that part is unknown. The product did clean my skin, my face didn't feel dirty. Did not feel like I needed to rewash my face.  I don't think I will be buying this product again. It wasn't for me.  Someone might like this product, others might not. I think its hard to get into the product. Its ok. its a product you don't fall in love with. its very replaceable and forgettable. Its kinda feels like a product one might use for a short time (like for medical) and then go back to your normal product.  Just doesn't feel like an everyday product. Something one uses for life. I am not into this product. Someone else might be. I think males might like this product more than females would. For me, when cleaning my skin, I want that feeling that makes me feel alive afterwards. I can start the day feeling, and then use at night to feel fresh and relaxed for bed. This product does not make me feel that way. Its a blah feeling. I just have clean skin but nothing makes me feel like it would boost my day and make me feel relaxed and fresh for bed. If you are looking for that feeling, then this product is not for you.
faceoff_negative.headline: Simple cleanser
